android.car.os

类 ThreadPolicyWithPriority

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.os.ThreadPolicyWithPriority

  • public final class ThreadPolicyWithPriority
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the thread scheduling policy and priority.

    This API supports real-time scheduling polices: (SCHED_FIFO, SCHED_RR) with a sched_priority value in the range within [PRIORITY_MIN, PRIORITY_MAX]. This API also supports the default round-robin time-sharing scheduling algorithm: SCHED_DEFAULT.

      static interface  ThreadPolicyWithPriority.SchedPolicy

        常量字段值

      • SCHED_DEFAULT

        public static final int SCHED_DEFAULT
        Default round-robin time-sharing scheduling policy.

        Same as SCHED_OTHER defined in /include/uapi/linux/sched.h.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SCHED_FIFO

        public static final int SCHED_FIFO
        First-in-first-out scheduling policy. See definition for Linux sched(7).

        Same as SCHED_FIFO defined in /include/uapi/linux/sched.h.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • SCHED_RR

        public static final int SCHED_RR
        Round robin scheduling policy. See definition for Linux sched(7).

        Same as SCHED_RR defined in /include/uapi/linux/sched.h.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ThreadPolicyWithPriority

        public ThreadPolicyWithPriority(int policy,
                                int priority)
        Creates a new thread policy with priority.
        参数:
        policy - The scheduling policy, must be one of ThreadPolicyWithPriority.SchedPolicy.
        priority - The priority, must be within [PRIORITY_MIN, PRIORITY_MAX].
